description:
Animates the object in a model according the given GDanitor animation data. Can also be used to just create objects as a model and move them around with the object with the 'ObjectAnimator' behavior.

## How to use:
- Create an object with the behavior 'ObjectAnimator'.
- Create the model using the action 'CreateModel'.
- Add or delete objects to the model using the actions 'AddObjectToModel' or 'RemoveObjectFromModel'
name: GDaitorAnimator
shortDescription: Turn animations in GDanitor into tweens for GDevelop Objects.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allows sprite objects to have GDanitor animations.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ObjectAnimator

eventsFunctions.sentence: Create the model for the object _PARAM0_.

eventsFunctions.name: AnimateModel
eventsFunctions.sentence: Animate the model of the object _PARAM0_ using objects _PARAM2_.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the animation has finished
